amendment.description: Amendment includes in the reporting requirements Senators representing States and Members of Congress representing congressional districts that would be significantly affected by a covered transaction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to add language to section 7 (which deals with Oversight by the Congress) providing that Senators representing States and Members of Congress representing congressional districts that would be significantly affected by a covered transaction should be affected by the reporting requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barrow amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
